channel.title: Hoodconnection - The Ghetto Medieval - BETA
channel.description:
[center]Hello, some of you may remember from a while ago about this server where me and Deathspirit were working on, well it is now in BETA stage and we need people to try it out and play it until an official release is made with more and improved features. If this is the wrong board to post and advertise this then sorry and you may lock or delete.
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2rrbbqv.png[/img]
[b]Download links:[/b]
[url=http://uppit.com/pf6wkglw0qx8/Hoodconnection.rar]Download Hoodconnection.rar @ UppIT[/url][/center]
[b]Hoodconnection, the ghetto medieval!"[/b]
Welcome to "the Hoodconnection", we offer you the most unique and professional oldschool server which is on the internet. Don't hesitate to get into the gang life of our server, everyone gets arranged into a particulair gang, the possible gangs you can get into are the following: Falador, Varrock, and Lumbridge. As this is a beta, feel free to spawn items, and do whatever you want as long as it's acceptable.
[b]List of Hoodconnection's Drugs:[/b] (Level 1) Weed. You can grow this. Items needed to use: Crack Pipe. (Level 20) Hashish. You can buy this. Items needed to use: Crack Pipe. (Level 40) Amphetamine. (Level 60) Cocaïne. (Level 80) Heroïn. Items needed to use: Needle and Heroïn.
To train the skill you will need a quest which is done making. Screens of the quest will be posted soon.
[b]Client:[/b] [img]http://img193.imageshack.us/img193/7008/clientx.png[/img]
[b]Smoking weed and getting high[/b] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VlUS71ANkxU]null - YouTube[/url]
[b]Screenshots:[/b]
A picture of the 1vs1 rap battle minigame, this allows two people to have a rap battle against eachother, it randomizes a punchline when you choose a line.
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/14btk44.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/15ft5jn.png[/img]
Christmas event of 2005 almost fully working, it's under construction at the moment (fixing some small bugs), but feel free to decorate the tree!
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/o6mzuo.png[/img]
[img]http://i51.tinypic.com/19wbqe.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/34g2f68.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2mze74m.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/256v59j.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/29gcw8z.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2h4dwxz.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img689.imageshack.us/img689/3063/1337357.png[/img] [img]http://img14.imageshack.us/img14/4369/13374.png[/img] [img]http://img402.imageshack.us/img402/3041/13372.png[/img] [img]http://img155.imageshack.us/img155/2227/1337o.png[/img]
[size=18pt]Custom Quests:[/size] Criminal Huntdown: [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aRUk4eGHiDw]null - YouTube[/url]
Illegal Business (The quest to start the Rastafari skill): [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Kf3BqpWFRW4]null - YouTube[/url]
Please post any suggestions on what should be changed, removed, etc.
